ComicInfo.Title: Robyn Hood & Helsing Keep It Safe
ComicInfo.Summary:
ROBYN HOOD & HELSING! LAUNCH POINT In this special two-part story, Liesel Van Helsing - genius, inventor, adventurer, lover of scones - joins Robyn's side as the two are in pursuit of a vampire who is turning his kills into spectacles on social media - but with nothing in the way of a lead, they'll have to go to the darkest corners of New York City for answers.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Jamal Igle & Brett Smith | Missing | B | Cover B | Roberta Ingranata & Alessia Nocera | Missing | C | Cover C | Maria Laura Sanapo & Victor Bartlett | Missing | Note: The digital edition (7/29/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
